title: T206 SGC Graded Cards For Sale...
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: T206 SGC Graded Cards For Sale...
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 graded cards for sale.  All have great eye appeal for the grade (even your wife won't complain about these).  Backs are all Piedmont or Sweet Caporal with the exception of a couple of Old Mill's.  Cards are in alphabetical order, a link to the back side is underneath each pic.
Prices include shipping.....paypal, check, money orders all work for me.  My email address is:  [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]

Lovely Day...

posts.post_title: I'll take the kid from Milwaukee...
posts.post_content:

thx
Jason

got my card today!
eye appeal (image clarity and sharpness) among the best of all my T206...thanks for the excellent specimen, shipped FAST, great pricing....five stars across all feedback
Thanks for launching my Milwaukee team set!

JasonL
